Summary: Extremely Extremely large and low altitude object hovering and moving slowly over treetops and us
divs: sighting detailsoutside to have a smoke. saw enormous object with rows of lights hovering and gliding slowly towards us. video taped it on my cell phone and never checked the recording until this week due to usual crap quality of phone ps taping abilities. this happened in august of this year. the object looked like it had a row of windows lighting white lit..several gold lights growing in brightness pulsing with red green...anyway. he is the link to my youtube video, also uploaded two other short clips as well. saw this same object last week and video taped it on my hd camera, right now my laptopis broken so as soon as i get it fixed will upload and report it here... the link for the object i am reporting in this report from august is here on this link..uploaded directly from my phone.
